# Configuration for module: main



if (ANDROID)
  set( PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES 
    main.c
  )

  set( PLATFORM_SOURCE_INSTALL "ANDROID" )
  source_group( "Platform Source Files" FILES ${PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES} )

endif ()

# Make sure the PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES variable is always defined
 set( PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES "" )

# For ease of use make a variable that has all files for this module
set( ALL_FILES ${HEADER_FILES} ${SOURCE_FILES} ${PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES} ${PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES} )


if( ANDROID )
  set( MODULE_NAME "main" )
endif()
if( ANDROID )
  add_library( ${MODULE_NAME} ${ALL_FILES} )
endif()

if ( ANDROID )
  add_dependencies( ${MODULE_NAME} gucefLOADER )
  target_link_libraries( ${MODULE_NAME} android android_native_app_glue )
endif( ANDROID )

include_directories( ../../../../common/include ../../../gucefCORE ../../../gucefCORE/include ../../../gucefCORE/include/ ../../../gucefLOADER/.. ../../../gucefLOADER/include ../../../gucefMT ../../../gucefMT/include ../../../gucefMT/include/ )

if ( ANDROID )
  include_directories( ../../../gucefCORE/include/ ../../../gucefCORE/include/android ../../../gucefMT/include/ )
endif( ANDROID )



#******** START OF AUTOGENERATED TEMPLATED ADDITION CONTENT ********




if (ANDROID)
GUCEF_config_lib( ${MODULE_NAME} )
endif()
